question: a)Please tell me a Dua'a which i can recite so my sister will get married...note that she lives in a different country
answer:
QUESTION
a)Please tell me a Dua'a which i can recite so my sister will get married. Please note that she lives in a different country.(b)Please give me a dua'a for my husband's business so hi get lots of success in it. JazaKallah Khair.
ANSWER


Share:
1. Your sister should read daily, ?Rabb anzilniy munazalan mubaarakan, wa anta khayral waaritheen?.

2. For success in business read, ?Allaahumma ikfiniy bihalaalika an haraamika wa aghniniy bi fadhlika amman siwaaka?.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
